hf_api_bearer_token.description: Your bearer token from the Hugging Face API

hf_model_path.description: Your bearer token from the Hugging Face API

labels.description: A comma-separated list of labels that will be applied

tag_kind.description: A value for 'kind' in the Tag objects that will be returned

use_gpu.description: Process HF requests on GPU (at greater speed and cost).
